import React, { useRef, useState, useEffect } from "react"; import { Redirect } from 'react-router'; import { Header } from "../../common/Header"; import { MDBBtn, MDBFreeBird, MDBCard, MDBCardBody, MDBCardImage, MDBCardText, MDBCol, MDBContainer, MDBFormInline, MDBIcon, MDBInput, MDBRow, MDBTable, MDBTableBody, MDBTableHead, MDBEdgeHeader, MDBCardTitle, MDBProgress, MDBListGroup, MDBListGroupItem, MDBBreadcrumbItem, MDBBreadcrumb } from "mdbreact"; import { useHistory } from "react-router"; import { Chart } from "react-google-charts"; import "./style.css"; import { fetchData } from '../../services/apiConfig' export const Pentest = (props: any) => { const [domains, setDomain] = useState([{ "name": "Phase-1", "period": "quarter-3", "infoCount": 0, "lowCount": 2, "mediumCount": 3, "highCount": 3, "criticalCount": 5, "totalCount": 13, "lastSynced": "()" }, { "name": "Phase-2", "period": "quarter-3", "infoCount": 0, "lowCount": 2, "mediumCount": 3, "highCount": 3, "criticalCount": 5, "totalCount": 13, "lastSynced": "September 06 2021, 02:15:08" }]); console.log(props) useEffect(() => { console.log(props.Account) if (props.Account.indexOf("quarter") > -1) { fetchData('vapt', 'GET', "?quarter=" + props.Account).then((res: any) => { console.log(res) // if(res.length>0){ setDomain(res) // } }) } else{ fetchData('vapt', 'GET', "?quarter=quarter-1").then((res: any) => { console.log(res) if(res.length>0){ setDomain(res) } }) } }, [props.Account]); const SubDomainSwitch = (e:any) => { console.log(e); props.SwitchView('subdomains', e) } const token = localStorage.getItem("token"); console.log(props) if (token === null || token === undefined || token.length < 0) { return } console.log(domains) return ( <> props.SwitchView('home')} color="blue-grey" style={{ border: "2px solid blue-grey", borderRadius: "5px", marginLeft: "0px !important", fontSize: "8px !important" }}> Back dashboard pentest

Penetration test

Last tested on {(domains.length > 0) ? domains[0].lastSynced : ""}

1
In progress

0
completed

0
In submission

{ (domains.length > 0) ? domains.map((dom: any) => <> SubDomainSwitch(dom.domainName) }>

{dom.name}

{dom.totalCount} issues

 ) :
No pentests performed in this quarter.
}
) }
